author: weaver
msg: - init(RequestContext) expects a non-null RequestContext.  It will raise an IllegalArgumentException

author: weaver
msg: - create() and createUrl() never return null and throw unchecked exceptions as this should not happen

author: weaver
msg: - getPortalUrl() never returns null and raises an IllegalStateException if getPortalUrl is called prior

author: weaver
msg: Switched from nestable exceptions in commons lang to Exception and RuntimeException since
1.4 supports causes in those classes now.
